name: div-examples
description: A wrapper to show various div-rs example packages

scripts.build: wasm-pack build ../hello_svelte; wasm-pack build ../hello_world; wasm-pack build ../reposition/; wasm-pack build ../styled/; wasm-pack build ../toggle; webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.release: wasm-pack build ../hello_svelte; wasm-pack build ../hello_world; wasm-pack build ../reposition/; wasm-pack build ../styled/; wasm-pack build ../toggle; webpack --config webpack.prod.js

author: Jakob Meier <inbox@jakobmeier.ch
